requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD R9 280 (2GB VRAM)

Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS, Ubuntu Linux 22.04, or similar
  • Processor: 11th gen Intel® Core™ i5, AMD 3000-series Ryzen™ 5, or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® Iris® Xᵉ Graphics or similar integrated graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum specs work for most features, but simultaneous drawing with a high line count (more than 16 lines in parallel) may cause stuttering. Additionally, WebM video exports are slow with minimum specs, switch to AVI for faster exports at the expense of disk space usage.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS, Ubuntu Linux 24.04, or similar
  • Processor: 13th gen Intel® Core™ i5, AMD 7000-series Ryzen™ 5, or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Recent NVIDIA or AMD dedicated graphics card (e.g. NVIDIA RTX™ 3060 Ti) with at least 4 GB vRAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Most MIDI keyboards are supported for additional piano-style input. (Limited keyboard piano functionality is also available.)
  • Additional Notes: Pressure-sensitive drawing supported with a game controller or a drawing tablet (e.g. Wacom).

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 (2 GB) or AMD Radeon HD 7770 (2 GB) (DirectX 11 compatible GPU)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: While it’s primarily a 2D game, it does use VFX Graph-based effects and simple 3D meshes, so a dedicated GPU is highly recommended over integrated graphics. The game is music-based, so a decent sound setup (headphones or speakers) is recommended for the best experience.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 (or newer) / AMD Ryzen 5 1400 (or newer)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (3 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 580 (4 GB) (DirectX 11/12 compatible GPU)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Because the game uses extensive particle effects and real-time VFX, a mid-range GPU will ensure smoother performance. For optimal audio fidelity in a music-centric game, consider higher-quality sound gear and updated drivers.
